channel.title: Guide book! Help, easy!
channel.description: I have a guide book when I create a new account on to my server. It does nothing since I haven't coded it yet. How can I make it that when I click "Read" on the book, an interface pops up saying something like [code]Welcome to BobScape To train you have to go to rock crabs, and to get money you have to earn it[/code]

item.title: Guide book! Help, easy!
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

What he said, find where your clicked items are processed and add the id of the book. Then look on some interface lists for the interface you want and add text accordingly.

Read full topic

item.title: Guide book! Help, easy!
item.dc:creator: @dawwn dawwn
item.description:
@dawwn wrote:

[quote=“i am infamy, post:2, topic:443885”]Clickitem.java add the id of the item, then make it where it pop’s up a interface and on the interface add your text
also look on google always google something before you ask many guides on google.[/quote]

I did google it, couldn’t find anything.

Read full topic

item.title: Guide book! Help, easy!

Clickitem.java add the id of the item, then make it where it pop’s up a interface and on the interface add your text
also look on google always google something before you ask many guides on google.
